data.meta_description: Get the latest Player Stats on Eri Hozumi including her videos, highlights, and more at the official Women's Tennis Association website.
data.text:
Personal

Coached by Fusako Sugiyama and Kuniaki Umeda ... Trains at the Palm International Tennis Acadamy in Kanagawa ... Mother's name is Shigeko ... Started playing tennis at age 6 ... Favorite surface is hard ... Speaks Japanese and English ... Tennis idol growing up was Ai Sugiyama ... Also enjoys karaoke and reading ... Favorite tournament is US Open.

Career Highlights

DOUBLES

Winner (5): 2022 - Adelaide 2, Bad Homburg, Rabat (all w/Ninomiya); 2018 - Hiroshima (w/S.Zhang); 2016 - Katowice (w/Kato).

Finalist (6): 2023 - Bad Homburg (w/Niculescu), Guangzhou (w/Ninomiya), Nanchang (w/Ninomiya); 2021 - Courmayeur (w/Zhang); 2019 - Sydney (w/Rosolska); 2018 - Auckland (w/Kato), Roland Garros (w/Ninomiya); 2016 - Kaohsiung (w/Kato).

Career in Review
